summary:
EXPERIENCE:
- More than 35 years of professional work experience.
- 12 years experience in renewable energy solutions S.a. biogas, solar and geothermal energy.
- 23 years experience in database design and integrating Business Systems with Geographical Systems and Mapping Services.
- Experience in setting up business relations with Turkey
- 35 years experience with Turkish business, language and culture
- Experience in international Outsourcing/Offshoring of IT projects contracting and managing them.
- 20 years of Program and Project management experience for projects of € 5.000.000 size and higher.
- Experience in patenting new products.
- Business Process Improving as Management Consultant.
- 8.5 years experience in an International Enterprise environment responsible for working according to standards in 6 EU Countries simultaneously (Netherlands, Belgium, France, Spain, Germany, Turkey and Italy).
- More than 6 years experience in setting up international healthcare projects and raising funding from the governments involved.
- 6 years experience in underground infrastructure projects.
- Team leader experience for 18 years
- Experienced in implementing ISO standards in organisations with a staff  from 9 to 1500 
- 3 years experience as film director for live events (volunteer)
GOALS:
Making the locally operating  company, that I currently lead, the best and most reliable in the market. Soon introducing to the world a game changing  safety and security system for buildings, mines, airports, stations, sport arena's and hospitals that will save many lives.

Specialties:
Safety, Health,  Environment, and Security
Renewable energy 
Biogas installations based on organic waste
Constucted wetlands
Energy saving solutions
International (IT) contracting
Project- Programmanagement
System en Process integration
Offshoring and Outsourcing IT projects (India and Turkey)
Geographic Information Systems
Traffic & Transportation Systems
Managing and realizing the cooperation between Turkish and Dutch companies (Fields: ICT, Construction and Sustainable Energy)
Mobile GIS solutions
Enterprise Application Integration
CAD-Systems
Underground Infrastructures
Geothermal Energy

projects:
[{'title': 'Schiebroek Warmte - design heat network', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'description': 'In the coming years, the Schiebroek and Polder Zestienhoven districts will be provided with a heat network that will make the current gas-fired boilers a thing of the past. The parent company of EES Holland, Enertrans, works closely with the municipality of Rotterdam. EES Holland is the executing party when it comes to design, management, construction, operation and management.

EES Holland is currently working on the energy supply of Schiebroek through a heat distribution network. EES is carrying out this project on behalf of Enertrans, where EES has provided the design part.

The heat distribution starts with a power station where residual heat from data centers is upgraded to a 75/40 ᵒC distribution network by means of various 2MW heat pumps.

In the near future, 50 MW of heat will be supplied by this power plant. The project is currently in the permitting phase.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Fred', 'last_name': 'van der Weijde', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Operationeel Directeur at ees Holland'}]}, {'title': 'Disaster and Emergency Management Training - Istanbul, Turkey', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'description': 'Working together with Conspectus Academy in Turkey, we organized the first important summit for higher management of the main holdings in Turkey. International speakers and local speakers made it very successful. Also give a course myself on technical solutions that can help in case of disaster.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Fred', 'last_name': 'van der Weijde', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Operationeel Directeur at ees Holland'}]}, {'title': 'Energy Savings for the Sunel Factory - Izmir, Turkey', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'description': 'Energy control in the tobacco factory of Sünel Ticaret A.Ş. in Izmir. 3 economizers were installed and monitoring the use of steam, electricity, gas and water using a SCADA system was realized. Unusual levels of energy usage are now immediately noticed and sent to responsible staff via an alarm system and live measurement to be followed online. In addition, LED lighting was installed according to our lighting plan in their warehouses according to European light standards for working areas that at the same time saved a lot of energy too.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Fred', 'last_name': 'van der Weijde', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Operationeel Directeur at ees Holland'}]}, {'title': 'Odour removal system at Anadolu Efes brewery - Izmir, Turkey', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'description': "In the Anadolu Efes brewery of the Efes beverage group in İzmir, there was steam coming out of some chimneys, which caused a bad odor exceeding the legal limits. In order to prevent the harmful effects of these gases, their concentrations had to be reduced to the levels specified in the regulations. Anadolu Efes wanted to reduce the odor level below 800 Odor Units/m3. That's almost not to smell anymore.

For this reason, EES designed and structured a treatment system for Anadolu Efes, taking into account the EPA and EU 2000/76/EC standards, as well as the regulations published by the Turkish Ministry of Environment and Urbanization.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Fred', 'last_name': 'van der Weijde', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Operationeel Directeur at ees Holland'}]}, {'title': 'Biogas Plant Sütaş at Karacabey - Bursa Turkey', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'description': "The fertilizers and other organic wastes that come out as waste from the Sütaş farms are processed in fermentation tanks with a capacity of 475 tons/day and a volume of 17000 m3, and the obtained biogas is converted into electricity thanks to a 3.5 MW high-efficiency cogenerator. The project has been implemented by ees on a turnkey basis. Project construction was carried out with high standards in accordance with earthquake specifications. For Enfaş, a Sütaş Group company, the installation of the 3.5 MW largest biogas plant using cattle manure in Turkey was started in 2013, it was completed in April 2014 and “green” energy production started. In addition, steam and hot water produced at the facility are used in Sütaş production facilities. The resulting product is sold as organic fertilizer. Currently, it is still the most efficient facility of Sütaş. According to Sütaş's annual report in 2017, they use only 8 tons of raw materials for 1 MW/hour at the facility in Karacabey. It works 20% more efficiently than other facilities of Sütaş.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Fred', 'last_name': 'van der Weijde', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Operationeel Directeur at ees Holland'}]}, {'title': 'Tegsis', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'description': 'TEGSIS Web programme management. TEGSIS web development realization within 10 months from scratch with an outsourcing partner in India. Fully operational Multilingual  Server Oriented web solution combining WebGIS, a Document Management System, a Management Information System and an Environmental Information and reporting system', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Fred', 'last_name': 'van der Weijde', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Operationeel Directeur at ees Holland'}]}]
